body_html:
@GSonderling For DNN classifier, loss is calculated by using softmax cross entropy.

There are many different types of losses and how they are calculated, please refer to tf.losses.. You should be able to modify the code to get average loss depending on how you define it.
body_text:
@GSonderling For DNN classifier, loss is calculated by using softmax cross entropy.
There are many different types of losses and how they are calculated, please refer to tf.losses.. You should be able to modify the code to get average loss depending on how you define it.
body:
@GSonderling For DNN classifier, loss is calculated by using softmax cross entropy.

There are many different types of losses and how they are calculated, please refer to [`tf.losses`.](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/losses). You should be able to modify the code to get average loss depending on how you define it.
